Articles.Content:
Last week Kaledonia commissioned her flagship and first carrier, The KM-1 Slivitz.

Yesterday at midnight after space worthiness tests she returned from the Mun for arming, and to attend the launch of kaledonia\'s first cruiser. The KS-1 Straube.

Kaledonia\'s first frigate and first dreadnought are in the design phase.

Here is a bow view of the Slivitz:

Here is a starboard view of the Straube.

More information on the Kaledonian navy to come soon.

This forum is meant to be an official place for everyone to make posts and share their spacecraft designs.

Please try to keep images to a reasonable size, and below 300KB

One rule: If you post a .craft file that requires 3rd party addons, you must also specify what addons those are, so people can load your ship.

Cheers

You\'ve managed to break the only rule of the forum, by not specifying add-ons

No download, just showing off.

That\'s kind of against the spirit of the spacecraft exchange, if you want to boast about your ships go to the RP forum. That aside nice ships, never seen such large vessels.

It uses C7, Novapunch, jellycubes and KW.

The reason I\'m not posting it is because of some difficulties I\'m having with the nodes.

I can\'t seem to use fuel lines to connect the engines to the mean fuel tank structure, so the main engines have a 5 second run time, I had to make .cfg edit engines for each of the ships so they could run for as long as the ships effective fuel capacity would allow otherwise. Until this problem can be overcome, no .craft file.
If you have the C7 flight pack, try adding one of the mini fuel tanks to the top of the free outer nodes, then run fuel lines to that, then to the engines, From the pictures I think this should work
The first ship reminds me of the stargate ships, it\'s really cool xD
